channel.title: Comments on: Meat Toaster Makes Steak Easier Than Toast

item.title: By: Thorbjørn Hame
item.dc:creator: Thorbjørn Hame
item.description: Hi. If you improoved it - it will save energi. It have to be more closed and have sections that can be turn on or switch off If you have to roast one or several numbers of pieces of meat. Good luck!
item.content:encoded:
Hi.
If you improoved it – it will save energi. It have to be more closed and have sections that can be turn on or switch off If you have to roast one or several numbers of pieces of meat. Good luck!

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: I don't think this product is available anywhere in the world anymore. Sorry.
item.content:encoded: I don’t think this product is available anywhere in the world anymore. Sorry.

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
Is this product available for purchase in Australia? If not are we able to purchase directly from your company?
Kind regards
Chris Smith
item.content:encoded:
